statements: SELECT * FROM researchers

SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, affiliation FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT data_content FROM TextualData WHERE research_topic='Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, data_category, research_topic FROM Researchers JOIN TextualData ON Researchers.researcher_id = TextualData.researcher_id;
SELECT result_description, result_category FROM AnalysisResults WHERE data_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University';

SELECT r.researcher_name, t.data_id, a.result_description FROM Researchers r JOIN TextualData t ON r.researcher_id = t.researcher_id JOIN AnalysisResults a ON t.data_id = a.data_id WHERE a.result_category = 'Positive';
SELECT researcher_name AS name, research_topic AS topic FROM Researchers WHERE research_topic LIKE '%machine learning%';

SELECT r.researcher_name, t.data_id, a.result_description FROM Researchers r, TextualData t, AnalysisResults a WHERE r.researcher_id = t.researcher_id AND t.data_id = a.data_id ORDER BY r.researcher_name ASC;
